title: SkinHolder
subtitle: Track your investments in Counter-Strike skins
whatIsDescription: SkinHolder is a comprehensive platform designed to help Counter-Strike players track and manage their skin investments. Available across multiple platforms including Web, Desktop (Windows/Linux), Android, and backed by a robust RESTful API.
architectureDesc: SkinHolder follows a clean architecture approach, ensuring separation of concerns and maintainability. The ecosystem consists of multiple clients communicating with a central API.
